@graph.schema:creditText: This project has received funding from the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under grant agreements GA101004746 (Polifonia) and GA870811 (SPICE).
@graph.schema:abstract: SPARQL Anything is a system for Semantic Web re-engineering that allows to query non-RDF files as-if they are in RDF.
